branchIdentification.description: Identifies a specific branch of a financial institution where the account is held

creationDateTime.description: Date and time at which the message was created. This property is formatted as a ISODateTime.

paymentType.description: Specifies the high level purpose of the request.Valid values are OTA for BScanC,OTA for Current and Savings Account,OTA for Credit Card,OTA for Speedy Cash.

agentIdentificationCode.description: Uniquely and unambiguously identify a financial institution or a branch of a financial institution.

validDuration.description: Validity period of the OTP code (expressed in seconds)

tokenId.description: One-time token provided by the tokenisation system.

messageIdentification.description: Point to point reference, as assigned by the instructing party, and sent to the next party in the chain to unambiguously identify the message.

creationDateTime.description: Date and time at which the message was created.

numberOfTransactions.description: Number of individual transactions contained in the message.

GroupHeader1.description: Set of characteristics shared by all individual transactions included in the message

InitiatingParty1.description: Set of elements used to identify a person or an organisation.

countryOfBirth.description: Country of birth in ISO 3166 format. For example: AU – Australia, TH - Thailand

country.description: Country in ISO 3166 format.For example: AU – Australia, TH - Thailand

OrganisationIdentification1.description: Unique and unambiguous way to identify an organisation.

Other1.description: Unique identification of an organisation, as assigned by an institution, using an identification scheme.

paymentInformationIdentification.description: Unique identification, as assigned by a sending party, to unambiguously identify the payment information group within the message.

paymentMethod.description: Specifies the means of payment that will be used to move the amount of money.

requestedCollectionDate.description: Date at which the initiating party requests the  agent to process the payment.

PaymentInformationDD.description: Set of characteristics that applies to the credit side of the payment transactions included in the direct debit initiation.

proprietary.description: Category purpose, in a proprietary form.

CategoryPurpose.description: Specifies the high level purpose of the instruction based on a set of pre-defined categories.

name.description: Name by which a party is known and which is usually used to identify that party

Creditor.description: Set of elements used to identify a person or an organisation. Party to which an amount of money is due

mobileNumber.description: Collection of information that identifies a mobile phone number, as defined by telecom services.

CreditorAccount.description: Provides the details to identify an account

Identification3.description: Specifies the unique identification of an account as assigned by the account servicer.

Other3.description: Information related to a generic account identification.

proprietary.description: Nature or use of the account in a proprietary form.

CreditorAccountType.description: Nature or use of the account.

CreditorAgent.description: Set of elements used to uniquely and unambiguously identify a financial institution or a branch of a financial institution servicing an account for the creditor

FinancialInstitutionIdentification.description: Set of elements used to identify a financial institution.

memberIdentification.description: Identification of a member of a clearing system.

ClearingSystemMemberIdentification.description: Name by which an agent is known and which is usually used to identify that agent.

identification.description: Unique and unambiguous identification of a branch of a financial institution

name.description: Name by which an agent branch is known and which is usually used to identify that agent

BranchIdentification.description: Identifies a specific branch of a financial institution

chargeBearer.description: Specifies which party/parties will bear the charges associated with the processing of the payment transaction.

instructionForCreditorAgent.description: Further information related to the processing of the payment instruction, provided by the initiating party, and intended for the creditor agent.

DirectDebitTransactionInformation.description: Provides information on the individual direct debit transaction(s) included in the message

endToEndIdentification.description: Unique identification assigned by the initiating party to unambiguously identify the transaction.

instructionIdentification.description: Unique identification as assigned by an instructing party for an instructed party to unambiguously identify the instruction.

PaymentIdentification.description: Set of elements used to provide further means of referencing a payment transaction.

PaymentTypeInformationServiceLevel.description: Set of elements used to provide further details of the type of payment.

code.description: Specifies a pre-agreed service or level of service between the parties, as published in an external service level code list.

ServiceLevel.description: Specifies the service level of the transaction

currency.description: Currency Code as per registered ISO 4217

InstructedAmount.description: Amount of money to be moved between the debtor and creditor, before deduction of charges, expressed in the currency as ordered by the initiating party

exchangeRate.description: Rate used to convert from one currency to another.  Length can include up to 5 decimal places.

ExchangeRateInformation.description: Contains details fo the exchange rate.

mandateIdentification.description: Unique identification, as assigned by the creditor, to unambiguously identify the mandate.

electronicSignature.description: Additional security provisions, such as a digital signature, as provided by the debtor.

MandateRelatedInformation.description: Provides further details of the direct debit mandate signed between the creditor and the debtor.

DebtorAgent.description: Set of elements used to uniquely and unambiguously identify a financial institution or a branch of a financial institution.

name.description: Name by which a party is known and which is usually used to identify that party.
Name of the account, as assigned by the account servicing institution, in agreement with the account owner in order to provide an additional means of identification of the account.

DebtorAccountCT.description: Provides the details to identify an account

name.description: Name of the account, as assigned by the account servicing institution, in agreement with the account owner in order to provide an additional means of identification of the account.

DebtorAccountDD.description: Provides the details to identify an account

proprietary.description: Nature or use of the account in a proprietary form.

DebtorAccountType.description: Nature or use of the account.

taxIdentification.description: Tax identification number of the debtor/creditor

DebtorCreditorTax.description: Tax details related to the debtor/creditor

SupplementaryData1.description: Additional information that cannot be captured in the structured elements and/or any other specific block.

Envelope1.description: Technical element wrapping the supplementary data.

terminalIdCardAcceptorName.description: Terminal’s name as specified in the Terminal ID

termType.description: The terminal type code as specified for channel transaction

annotation.description: Annotation text provided by the initiating party(Creditor)

businessPurpose.description: The underlying purpose of the payment.

accountServicerReference.description: Unique reference, as assigned by the account servicing institution, to unambiguously identify the instruction.

postingType.description: Indicated the type of posting. It is used to dereive the transaction type for the Core Banking System

SupplementaryData4.description: Additional information that cannot be captured in the structured elements and/or any other specific block.

Envelope4.description: Technical element wrapping the supplementary data.

additionalNote.description: Additional note (remarks) entered by Initiating party (payer) for the Payee.

annotation.description: Annotation text provided by Initiating Party (Payer).

businessPurpose.description: The underlying purpose of the payment.

accountServicerReference.description: Unique reference, as assigned by the account servicing institution, to unambiguously identify the instruction.

postingType.description: Indicates the type of posting. It is used to derirve the transaction type for the Core Banking System and must be supplied for the confirm flow

region.description: Unique and unambiguous identification of the region of the branch terminal

terminalNo.description: Unique and unambiguous identification of the terminal in the branch

terminalSequence.description: Sequence of the transaction initiated from the terminal in the branch

batchBooking.description: Used to indicate whether lump sum credit/debit posting is requested

SupplementaryDataDebtorCreditor.description: Contains the additional details about the debtor/creditor

smsLanguage.description: Specifies the language for the SMS communication

emailLanguage.description: Specifies the language for the Email communication

SupplementaryDataContactDetails.description: Contains the additional details about the debtor/creditor contact information

SupplementaryDataDebtorAccount.description: Contains the additional details about the debitor account

SupplementaryDataCreditorAccount.description: Contains the additional details about the creditor account

identification.description: Type of the identifier entered by the customer to indicate account

ProxyIdentification1.description: Set of elements entered by the customer, which indicates the account

IdentificationType.description: Type of the identifier entered by the customer to indicate account

identification.description: Type of the Identification in a proprietary form

issuer.description: Issuer of the type of Identification

oCCode.description: OC Code that is recorded to each business unit for fee amount in GL entries

messageIdentification.description: MessageIdentification is unique per instructed party

creationDateTime.description: Date and time at which the message was created

originalMessageIdentification.description: Point to point reference, as assigned by the original instructing party

originalMessageNameIdentification.description: Specifies the original message name identifier to which the message refers

originalCreationDateTime.description: Date and time at which the original message was created

reversalPaymentInformationIdentification.description: Unique identification, as assigned by an instructing party for an instructed party

originalPaymentInformationIdentification.description: Unique identification, as assigned by the original sending party

reversalIdentification.description: Unique identification, as assigned by an instructing party for an instructed party

originalInstructionIdentification.description: Unique identification, as assigned by the original instructing party for the original instructed party

originalEndToEndIdentification.description: Unique identification, as assigned by the original initiating party

chargeBearer.description: Specifies which party/parties will bear the charges associated with the processing of the payment transaction

currency.description: Currency Code as per registered ISO 4217
Currency Code as per registered ISO 4217

items.description: Additional information on the reason for reversal

proprietary.description: Reason for the reversal, in a proprietary form

clearingDatetime.description: Contains the original message for which this request is originated

customerType.description: Customer type from CBS response (eg GN).

obligationType.description: Obligation type from CBS response (eg GN)s

name.description: Account name from CBS response (eg GN) for debtor/creditor account

statusCode.description: Account status code from CBS response (eg GN) for debtor/creditor account

statusDescription.description: Account status description from CBS response (eg GN) for debtor/creditor account

availableBalance.description: Account available balance from CBS response (eg GN) for debtor/creditor account

oCCode.description: OC code from CBS response (eg GN) for debtor/creditor account

accountShortName.description: Account shortname from CBS response (eg GN)

originalAccountServicerReference.description: Unique reference, as assigned by the account servicing institution, to unambiguously identify the instruction

messageIdentification.description: Point to point reference, as assigned by the instructing party

creationDateTime.description: Date and time at which the message was created

originalMessageIdentification.description: Point to point reference, as assigned by the original instructing party

originalMessageNameIdentification.description: Specifies the original message name identifier to which the message refers.

originalCreationDateTime.description: Date and time at whch the original message was created.

originalNumberOfTransactions.description: Number of individual transactions contained in the original message

originalPaymentInformationIdentification.description: Unique identification, as assigned by the original sending party

paymentInformationStatus.description: Original payment status in external coded value

originalInstructionIdentification.description: Unique identification, as assigned by the original instructing party.

originalEndToEndIdentification.description: Unique identification, as assigned by the original initiating party

transactionStatus.description: Specifies the status of a transaction

acceptanceDateTime.description: Point in time when the payment order from the initiating party meets the processing conditions of the account servicing agent

accountServicerReference.description: Unique reference, as assigned by the account servicing institution, to unambiguously identify the instruction.

clearingSystemReference.description: Unique reference, as assigned by a clearing system, to unambiguously identify the instruction.

interbankSettlementDate.description: Date on which the amount of money ceases to be available to the agent that owes it and when the amount of money becomes available to the agent to which it is due

currency.description: Currency Code as per registered ISO 4217

responseStatus.description: Provides the overall status of the request processing

statusReasonCode.description: Status code associated with request processing

tokenUuid.description: Unique identifier for the OTA cancelled

messageIdentification.description: Point to point reference, as assigned by the instructing party, and sent to the next party in the chain to unambiguously identify the message.

creationDateTime.description: Date and time at which the message was created. This property is formatted as a ISODateTime.

originalInstructionIdentification.description: Payment status report original instruction identification
